posts.post_content:
The card is Sold.

Hi,

I have a 19110 T205 John Lobert (Sovereign back PSA) for sale. 

Just a note about me, I used to post a lot more on the Net 54 board a few years back.
I've moved away from collecting but now I am selling some of my remaining cards. I have had many dealings on this board.
I wanted to make this comment because I haven't been on this board that much in a while.

Thanks for looking.

Cy
Yes it is. The back is MC. I thought people would see that easily when viewing the picture. But I just made an edit and put it on the listing.

Hi Cy

"MC", or whatever....this card will fit into my T205 John Lobert run very nicely.

I will buy it.

Ted Z

[url]tedzan11@comcast.net[/url]

.

Ted,

I sent you an e-mail.

Cy
